outputStrategy

Class SimplexBasicPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • outputStrategy.SimplexBasicPool

  • public class SimplexBasicPool
extends Object
    The SimplexBasicPool is a component of the BasicPool, which does the handling of the messages.
    Author:
    Karl-Peter Fuchs

        constructor to establish a new SimplexBatch

        poolSize - size of the pool before it is given out
